DOC.brief_summary: Copepod oil extract marine copepod Calanus finmarchicus , dominant plankton specie marine food web Norwegian Sea . Copepods constitute large renewable harvestable resource Norwegian Sea adjacent water , develop knowledge technology sustainable harvest `` new '' resource . The purpose study investigate whether Calanus copepod oil supplementation equivalent effect maximal oxygen uptake human see experimental study mice .
DOC.brief_title: Calanus Oil Supplementation Maximal Oxygen Uptake
DOC.criteria: good health Body mass index ( BMI ) 18,5 29,9 Medical condition limit VO2max ( COPD asthma ) . diagnose coronary artery disease Any significant medical condition medication effect exercise capacity ( e.i . betablockers ) Pregnancy Participation clinical trial Shellfish allergy Systolic blood pressure > 170 mmHG , diastolic BP > 105 mmHG . contraindication maximal exercise testing
